Uses of Class
trapomino.Position

    • Uses of Position in trapomino

      Fields in trapomino declared as Position 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Position[] Tetromino.positions 
      Methods in trapomino that return Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position Entity.getGridPosition()
      This method returns the current Position the Entity occupies.
      Position[] Animal.getPositions()
      This method returns the array of Positions on the Grid occupied by the Animal.
      Methods in trapomino that return types with arguments of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Position> Tetromino.getPositions()
      This method returns the Positions the Tetromino occupies in the Grid.
      Methods in trapomino with parameters of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Grid.changeToTrapped(Position pos)
      This method stores the id of a trapped location in the UnionMap and checks every Position in the grid to see if its UnionMap value matches.
      boolean UnionMap.find(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      This method checks to see if the two passed Positions in the array have the same value.
      static boolean Grid.findTrap(Position pos)
      This method checks if the Animal at the given Position has been trapped.
      static boolean Grid.inGrid(Position pos)
      This method checks if the given Position is contained within the Grid.
      void Animal.makeBlocks(int x, int y, Position[] newPositions)
      This method sets the new X and Y coordinates and the new Positions of the Animal.
      boolean Animal.moveCheck(Position[] newPositions, int xMovement, int yMovement)
      This method sets the new X and Y coordinates of the position and then checks whether or not the Animal is able to move to the given new Position.
      boolean Tetromino.moveCheck(Position[] newPositions, int xMovement, int yMovement)
      This method checks whether or not the Tetromino can move to the given new Positions in the Grid.
      static boolean Grid.similar(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      This method checks if the two given Positions have the same shape.
      void UnionMap.Unite(Position pos1, Position pos2)
      This method checks through every index in the 2D-array to see if it has the same value as the given Position.
      Constructors in trapomino with parameters of type Position 
      Constructor and Description
      Animal(int x, int y, Grid grid, Position[] positions, Grid.SHAPE name, int score)
      This constructor sets the class variables defined above to the given variables.
